title: Part 322 - Instructions-gas Plant Accounts
content:
Part 322 - Instructions-gas Plant Accounts

State Regulations
§ 322.1 - Gas plant to be recorded at original cost
§ 322.2 - Additions and retirements of gas plant
§ 322.3 - Components of construction cost
§ 322.4 - Land and land rights
§ 322.5 - Structures and improvements
§ 322.6 - Work order system required (class c utilities only)
§ 322.7 - Transfers of property
§ 322.8 - Expenditures on property leased for use in gas operations

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
